description: Collections of metrics related to block streaming from consensus nodes to block nodes.

panels.description: 0 = OK, 1 = Action Stage, 2 = Recovering, 3 = Back Pressure Enabled
panels.title: Buffer State

panels.description: The time in ms from sending the BlockProof to receiving the BlockAcknowledgement
panels.title: BlockAcknowledgement Latency (ms)

panels.description: Which block node is the active connection for each consensus node
panels.title: Block Node Connections (CN -> BN)
High latency events for the current active connection (1m delta)
Latest block received in an EndOfStream response
Latest block received in a ResendBlock response
Latest block received in a SkipBlock response

panels.description: The running average of PublishStreamRequest latency in ms as measured from submission to PBJ Pipeline.
panels.title: PublishStreamRequest Latency Mean (ms) (1m)

title: Block Stream Metrics (CN -> BN)
